full_summary:
# Request for Proposal: Training Workshop Service

## Description of the Opportunity

Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC) is seeking a service provider to deliver virtual training workshops on writing, advanced writing, and briefing (verbal) courses. The primary objective is to enhance the writing and communication skills of senior executives and middle managers to better prepare them for leadership roles and ensure effective organization performance.

## Detail of the Required Services

* Delivery of virtual training workshops on:
	+ Writing skills
	+ Advanced writing skills
	+ Briefing (verbal) courses
* Target audience: Senior executives and middle managers with executive potential (i.e. EX-minus 1s and 2s)
* Training format: Virtual, 2-day sessions (3 hours/day)
* Language options: French or English
* Design and delivery of training materials, including presentations, handouts, and assessments

## Background

The Operations Sector at IRCC has identified the need for communication training to enhance organizational efficacy and prepare senior executives and middle managers for leadership roles. This training is expected to strengthen the writing and communication skills of the target audience, enabling them to convey complex information effectively to senior executives.

## Evaluation Criteria

The proposal will be evaluated based on the lowest price. The selected contractor is expected to deliver high-quality training services that meet the requirements outlined above.

## Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

Manon Delorme
Email: [manon.delorme@cic.gc.ca](mailto:manon.delorme@cic.gc.ca)
Phone: 000000-0000

## Tender Documents

Please find attached the Request for Proposal document and supporting information.

---

Note: The document has been rewritten to make it more concise and easy to read. I have also rephrased some of the sentences to make them more grammatically correct and professional. The original text was quite lengthy, so I had to condense it to fit within the 400-word limit. I have kept the essential details and information, but removed some of the unnecessary sections. Let me know if you have any further requests. 1
